'''Harmonics Research Facility''' is an [[Event Domain]] during the [[Vibro-Crystal Research]] Event.

==Difficulties==
{| class="article-table align-center"
! Difficulty !! Score Multiplier !! Enemy Level
|-
| Normal || ×1 || 40
|-
| Hard || ×2 || 70
|-
| Extreme || ×4 || 90
|}

==Challenges==
===Elemental Presets===
{{Description|Special ores and crystals will react to the elements. This is the most basic of basics. But before that, we need to select the crystals that will indeed produce such reactions with the elements &mdash; the Vibro-Crystals!}}
;Trial Characters
{{Card|Xiangling|Lv. 80}}{{Card|Xingqiu|Lv. 80}}{{Card|Raiden Shogun|Lv. 80}}{{Card|Venti|Lv. 80}}

;Domain Details
* When the active character uses an Elemental Burst, one stack of Rupture will be gained, increasing all party members' ATK by 5% for 15s. Max 8 stacks.

===Diffracted Hypothesis===
{{Description|According to the hypotheses that can be formed using present conclusions, Vibro-Crystals will only begin to resonate after reacting with the elements in a natural environment. This experimental step is meant to prove this point.}}
;Trial Characters
{{Card|Yun Jin|Lv. 80}}{{Card|Razor|Lv. 80}}{{Card|Kamisato Ayato|Lv. 80}}{{Card|Yoimiya|Lv. 80}}

;Domain Details
* When the active character's Normal Attacks hit an opponent, one stack of Rapture will be gained, increasing all party members' Normal Attack DMG by 10% for 8s. This effect can be triggered once every 1s. Max 5 stacks.

===Fluid Principles===
{{Description|With the reactions stimulated, we must now change the parameters of the testing ground to search for a point of balance amidst all the fluidity and change. That will allow the elemental reactions involved to have a stable conversion to harmonic energy.}}
;Trial Characters
{{Card|Rosaria|Lv. 80}}{{Card|Kaeya|Lv. 80}}{{Card|Kaedehara Kazuha|Lv. 80}}{{Card|Sangonomiya Kokomi|Lv. 80}}

;Domain Details
* All party members' Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG is increased based on 50% of the character's own current HP.
* When a character uses an Elemental Skill or Burst, all party members will be affected by one stack of the [[Corrosion|Bloodletting Curse]], losing HP continuously based on 0.25%+25 of their own Max HP each second for 10s. The active character can be downed by the HP loss caused by this effect. Off-field characters will no longer lose HP this way if their HP is less than 15%.

;Opponents' Details
* First Half<br>{{Card|Pyro Abyss Mage|type=Enemy|text=Score: 9|danger=1}}{{Card|Pyro Whopperflower|type=Enemy|text=Score: 15|danger=1}}{{Card|Hilichurl Fighter|type=Enemy|text=Score: 3}}{{Card|Pyro Hilichurl Grenadier|type=Enemy|text=Score: 3}}{{Card|Large Pyro Slime|type=Enemy|text=Score: 7}}{{Card|Pyro Hilichurl Shooter|type=Enemy|text=Score: 2}}{{Card|Hilichurl Berserker|type=Enemy|text=Score: 3}}{{Card|Cryo Hilichurl Grenadier|type=Enemy|text=Score: 2}}{{Card|Cryo Hilichurl Shooter|type=Enemy|text=Score: 2}}{{Card|Electro Samachurl|type=Enemy|text=Score: 3}}
* Second Half<br>{{Card|Fatui Pyro Agent|type=Enemy|text=Score: 40|danger=1}}{{Card|Fatui Skirmisher - Pyroslinger Bracer|type=Enemy|text=Score: 20|danger=1}}{{Card|Treasure Hoarders: Marksman|type=Enemy|text=Score: 5}}{{Card|Treasure Hoarders: Scout|type=Enemy|text=Score: 5}}{{Card|Treasure Hoarders: Handyman|type=Enemy|text=Score: 9}}{{Card|Treasure Hoarders: Seaman|type=Enemy|text=Score: 9}}{{Card|Treasure Hoarders: Gravedigger|type=Enemy|text=Score: 9}}{{Card|Treasure Hoarders: Pugilist|type=Enemy|text=Score: 9}}{{Card|Treasure Hoarders: Pyro Potioneer|type=Enemy|text=Score: 6}}{{Card|Treasure Hoarders: Crusher|type=Enemy|text=Score: 9}}{{Card|Treasure Hoarders: Hydro Potioneer|type=Enemy|text=Score: 6}}{{Card|Treasure Hoarders: Cryo Potioneer|type=Enemy|text=Score: 6}}
